Class Stages

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stages
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Stages extends Object implements Serializable
stages stores the information relevent to stages

  • Constructor Details

    • Stages

      public Stages​(int id, int raceId, String stageName, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType type)
      Creates a new stage
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the stage
      raceId - The RaceID of the race the stage belongs to
      stageName - The name of the stage
      description - A description of the stage
      length - The length of the stage
      startTime - The startTime of the stage
      type - The type of stage

  • Method Details

    • addCheckpoint

      public void addCheckpoint​(int checkpointID)
      Adds a checkpoint to the stage
      Parameters:
      checkpointID - The ID of the checkpoint to be added

    • removeCheckpoint

      public void removeCheckpoint​(int checkpointID) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Removes a checkpoint from the stage
      Parameters:
      checkpointID - ID of the checkpoint to be removed
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the checkpoint is not found listed in the stage (so cannot be removed)

    • removeRider

      public boolean removeRider​(int riderID)
      Removes rider from the stage along with all their results
      Parameters:
      riderID - ID of the rider to be removed
      Returns:
      True if there was data to remove, false if not

    • setStageState

      public void setStageState()
      Changes the stage state to "waiting for results"

    • getStageState

      public String getStageState()
      Returns the stage state, this is either: "in development", "waiting for results"
      Returns:
      Stage State

    • getStageID

      public int getStageID()
      Returns:
      Stage ID of the stage

    • getStageName

      public String getStageName()
      Returns:
      Name of the stage

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns:
      Description of the stage

    • getLength

      public Double getLength()
      Returns:
      Length of the stage

    • getStartTime

      public LocalDateTime getStartTime()
      Returns:
      Start-time of the race

    • getType

      public StageType getType()
      Returns:
      Type of stage

    • getResultsSize

      public int getResultsSize()
      Returns:
      Number results in stage

    • getCheckpoints

      public int[] getCheckpoints()
      Gets a list of all the checkpoints in a stage
      Returns:
      Array of checkpoint IDs

    • stageAsString

      public String stageAsString()
      Returns:
      A string containing the basic information contained within a stage

    • setResults

      public void setResults​(int riderId, LocalTime... times) throws DuplicatedResultException
      Adds the results from a specific rider to the stage
      Parameters:
      riderId - ID of the rider who's results are being added
      times - LocalTime times for the rider's results, these should be in order of the checkpoints
      Throws:
      DuplicatedResultException - If the given rider already has results for that stage

    • getRiderTimes

      public LocalTime[] getRiderTimes​(int riderID) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Gets the times of each checkpoint for a given rider in the stage
      Parameters:
      riderID - The ID of the rider whose results are being returned
      Returns:
      LocalTime array of times in order of checkpoints
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If the Rider has no registered results in the stage

    • realElapsedTime

      public LocalTime realElapsedTime​(int riderID)
      Returns the unadjusted elapsed time from the start to the end of the stage for a given rider
      Parameters:
      riderID - ID of the rider whose total time is checked
      Returns:
      The LocalTime elapsed between the start and end of the stage

    • getAdjustedTime

      public LocalTime getAdjustedTime​(int riderId)
      Returns the adjusted total time for a given rider to complete the stage
      Parameters:
      riderId - Rider whose adjusted time is being returned
      Returns:
      The adjusted LocalTime of the stage's completion by a given rider

    • getAdjustedRank

      public LocalTime[] getAdjustedRank()
      Ranks the results in order of adjusted elapsed time to complete the stage

      Caculates adjustements and returns them in order of speed. This corresponds to the order of Riders given by getRank().

      Returns:
      The adjusted times in order of fastest to slowest. Or an empty array if no results are registered

    • getRank

      public int[] getRank()
      Returns a list of the Rider IDs in the order they finished according to their adjusted times
      Returns:
      Rider IDs in order of completion. This will return an empty array if no results are registered.

    • calculateAdjustment

      public void calculateAdjustment()
      Calculates the adjusted times for riders in the stage

      This updates the attribute adjustedTimes for use in other methods. Adjustments are made if a rider has a finishing time less than one second slower than the person ahead.

      This should not be called if no results are registered or on time trials

    • calculateStagePoints

      public int[] calculateStagePoints()
      Calculates the number of points a person will earn in a given stage

      These will correspond to the points assigned for different stage types.

      Returns:
      An array of points assigned to riders in the order they place in the stage

    • calulateRankedCheckpoint

      public void calulateRankedCheckpoint()
      Calculates the checkpoint ranks for a stage using the checkpoint times in results and adds them to a hash map that you can access.

    • getRankedCheckpoint

      public int[] getRankedCheckpoint​(int checkpointID)
      gets the checkpoint rank from the hashmap based on its checkpoint ID
      Parameters:
      checkpointID - Checkpoint ID whose time is being retrived
      Returns:
      the ranks for a given checkpoint
